title: What's Up With JavaScript?
body: As a newer developer, it can be overwhelming to choose which programming language to focus on, especially considering the rapidly evolving technology landscape. One of the most popular languages out there right now is JavaScript, and with good reason. However, like anything in life, JavaScript has its pros and cons. Do you know JavaScript? What is your take on this? Sound off in the comments!

title: Centering a DIV
body: Admit it. You've had to look it up after not using it for a while. Let's help each other out! Post your go-to method in the comments.

title: Best Order To Learn?
body: Imagine you're learning to code for the first time. What do you think is the best order to proceed? HTML, CSS, JS? Python or Java? Something else? Let's help out the newbs...post your ideal path in the comments.
